title: DUSTER COAT WITH PEGASO BUTTONS
desc: Long, regular-fit duster coat with medallion and Paisley motif all over. This model is enhanced by metal buttons with a raised Pegaso symbol and trims along the edge of the opening and pocket flaps. Completing the garment is contrasting inner lining.• Regular fit• V-neck• Fastened with Pegaso buttons• Front pockets with flap• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
